name: Chartered Marketer (CMktr)
description: The Chartered Marketer designation is the highest level of professional certification awarded by the Chartered Institute of Marketing. It recognises strategic-level marketers with up-to-date skills, ethics, and leadership in marketing practice.

renewal.name: Chartered Marketer Annual Renewal
renewal.description: Credential holders must complete ongoing CPD and maintain good standing with the CIM to retain their Chartered status.
